content:
Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a lever, I need to craft a stick first. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side. Therefore I will move one of the bamboos from slot 16 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side. Therefore I will move the other bamboo from slot 16 into slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: Now that the stick is crafted, I can move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a lever, I need to place a stick on top of a cobblestone. I already have a cobblestone at slot 30 and a stick at slot 11. Therefore, I will move the stick to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]
thought: I have already placed the stick at slot 1. Now I need to place the cobblestone below the stick, so I will move the cobblestone to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: lever
inventory=[{"type": "lever", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "bone", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 33, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
